availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh O'Donnell (Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Tennessee native. Married to Sabrina Price O'Donnell in Washington County, Tennessee, on October 18, 1846. Father of Nancy O'Donnell, James O'Donnell, Sarah O'Donnell, Eliza Jane O'Donnell, and Daniel O'Donnell. Farmer in Jackson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Justice of the peace in Jackson County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, My Division, p. 881.
